definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to live one's life/to pass one's days/to get along

sentences.english: In those days we did not need spies to watch the enemy's movement .
sentences.chinese: 在那些日子裏，我們不需要情報員注意敵人動向。

sentences.english: Some days must be dark and dreary.
sentences.chinese: 有些日子肯定幽暗而鬱悒。

sentences.english: Friendship and play shorten the day.
sentences.chinese: 好朋友，共遊玩，日子過得歡。

sentences.english: So they were shut up unto the day of their death, living in widowhood.
sentences.chinese: 她們如同寡婦被禁，直到死的日子。

sentences.english: It is the last day of qi yue and our geomancer says it is auspicious.
sentences.chinese: 那是七月的最後一天，風水師父說是個吉祥的日子。

sentences.english: Some time afterwards, M. Madeleine was appointed mayor.
sentences.chinese: 過些日子，馬德蘭先生被任命爲市長。

sentences.english: Hope in the day of aftertime to get along with everyone delectation.
sentences.chinese: 希望在今後的日子裏與大家相處愉快。

sentences.english: Do you know what day this is?
sentences.chinese: 你們知道今天是什麼日子嗎？

sentences.english: Memories of happier days were enshrined in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 以前快樂日子的記憶銘刻在我的心中。

sentences.english: I miss the good old days, 'she added sentimentally .
sentences.chinese: “我懷念過去那些美好的日子，”她動情地補充道。

sentences.english: I didn't take part in any artistic activities for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 那段日子很漫長，不參加任何藝事活動。

sentences.english: Day lining being apt each other in us.
He had constipation for few days but still had flatus passage todays.
sentences.chinese: 他有少許日子是便祕的，但是今天仍然有排氣。

sentences.english: How long will that special date? Llama Llama has to wait.
sentences.chinese: 多久纔到這個特別的日子？羊駝拉瑪要等待。

sentences.english: However, the Autumn Equinox is not a fixed day and there may or may not be a full moon on that day.
sentences.chinese: 然而，每年秋分的日子都不同，在秋分不一定有圓月。

sentences.english: You have made your way around this hill country long enough; now turn north.
sentences.chinese: 你們繞行這山的日子夠了，要轉向北去。

definition: How are you getting by?/How's life?/contraction of 過得去|过得去, can get by/tolerably well/not too bad
to pass/to spend (time)/to survive/to get through
to pass one's days/to scratch out a difficult, meager existence
to live one's life/to pass one's days/to get along
